ygData.subject: dex and procing
ygData.msgSnippet: does anyone know how much more procing goes on at various dex levels above 100? My base is 95, with my best AC stuff it s at 107. I have a BP neclace (mostly
ygData.messageBody:
does anyone know how much more procing goes on at various dex levels above
100? My base is 95, with my best AC stuff it's at 107. I have a BP neclace
(mostly to get my agility above 100) which takes it to 114. I *could* swap
out a jagged band or two for 5 dex/7 cha rings and so get it as high as 124.
but I lost 5AC for the neclace and would lose another 5 or 10 with the rings
(mind you I am in full lambent at 15, so I should have a *bit* of room to
move on AC)

Procing will be a big deal for me this time around (I haven't mentioned my
latest bard project), I have an Obsidian shard and a Blade of Fiery
Lamentations. The shard procs at 16 and I have not found an answer on the
BoFL but one person (I think on concert hall) claimed theirs did at 19, I am
heading towards finding out. If the BoFL procs a lot more with higher dex it
could be a huge difference in my teens and twenties.

Quick side note, I have shelved Tszaaz and started this new bard to replace
him. Why? Lots of reasons, but hunting at lower levels is easier when you
can't play much. I DO like the big difference in stats (new guy is a half
elf) even if I hate the Star Trek (Original) pants and bucket head.

So, anyone have any real statistics? Also I assumed that getting agi over
100 was important, is there some magic number in particular to reach?

Tszaaz



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
